address.description: Ethereum address to send the data to, if a contract to update already exists.

functionID.description: Ethereum function ID to send the data to, if a contract to update already exists.

value.description: Converted to a string from which the first 32 bytes are pulled and formatted to be written into Ethereum bytes32 format.
The input value passed in, converted to string, and then pulled the first 32 bytes.

txid.description: ID of the transaction that was written into Ethereum to create the update.
